item.title: Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v3
item.description:
“catacomb”by begemot_dn is licensed under CC BY-NC 2.0
Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v3 (PDF) Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus v3 (ODT) Last week I posted about my play test of the Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus using Temple of the Moon Priests. That session was enlightening and caused me to spend a lot of time thinking about SotU and the lessons I had learned. After talking to my players and many of you online, I decided to make some changes which culminated in version 3 of the Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus.

item.title: Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus
item.description: Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus (PDF) Searchers of the Unknown Omnibus (ODT) A friend of mine had been asking me for a few years now if we could play D&D. She has never played before and it got me thinking about the quickest and easiest way to introduce new players to tabletop roleplaying games. I looked at HERE’S SOME FUCKIN’ D&D by Dustin R. I really liked the simplicity of it but felt the tone and mechanics were not quite what I was looking for.
